tachyon.client.worker

Class BlockWorkerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.ClientBase
      • tachyon.client.worker.BlockWorkerClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @ThreadSafe
public final class BlockWorkerClient
extends ClientBase
    The client talks to a block worker server. It keeps sending keep alive message to the worker server. Since BlockWorkerClientService.Client is not thread safe, this class has to guarantee thread safety.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class tachyon.ClientBase

        Creates a BlockWorkerClient.
        Parameters:
        workerNetAddress - to worker's location
        executorService - the executor service
        conf - Tachyon configuration
        sessionId - the id of the session
        isLocal - true if it is a local client, false otherwise
        clientMetrics - metrics of the client

        public void createNewSession(long newSessionId)

        Parameters:
        newSessionId - the new id that represents the new session

      • lockBlock

        public LockBlockResult lockBlock(long blockId)
                          throws IOException
        Locks the block, therefore, the worker will not evict the block from the memory until it is unlocked.
        Parameters:
        blockId - The id of the block
        Returns:
        the path of the block file locked

      • sessionHeartbeat

        public void sessionHeartbeat()
                      throws ConnectionFailedException,
                             IOException
        Sends a session heartbeat to the worker. This renews the client's lease on resources such as locks and temporary files and updates the worker's metrics.
        Throws:
        ConnectionFailedException - if network connection failed
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • periodicHeartbeat

        public void periodicHeartbeat()
        Called only by WorkerClientHeartbeatExecutor, encapsulates sessionHeartbeat() in order to cancel and cleanup the heartbeating thread in case of failures
